page.title: 12Describing My house
page.content: My house is on an estste and is semi- detatched. The roof has grey tiles and a brick chimney. It has a glass and wood door. The windows are large, double glazed with metal frames. The walls are brick but some of the upstairs walls have tile facing. Under the windows at the front has tile facing. There is an extention at the back. The kitchen and dining room were extended and a new bathroom built. At the back the windows are casemant with wood frames and no double glazing. There are metal-framed patio doors on the new dining room. I have been living there for nearly 13 years. It is a fairly old estate. There are 4 bedrooms, kitchen, dining room, lounge hall, bathroom, toilet, landing, and an attic. I love my house! Juliet Smith. 12, Meon Road, Romsey, Hampshire.
